description: Explore License-Token, a pioneering approach to enhance the visibility of open-source projects by incorporating licensing information into project metadata. Learn how it addresses challenges of discoverability and facilitates better engagement in the open-source community.
keywords: License-Token, open source projects, project visibility, software licensing, metadata, open-source community, discoverability, software development, GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket
title: License-Token: Enhancing Open Source Project Visibility
